```{r Cian's dataset}

# Cians' Second Draft Data

draft_data2 <- read.xlsx("Raw_Data_Liz/Second_Draft_Data.xlsx")


#take out 2019 bc polity data ends at 2018 

draft_data2 <-  filter(draft_data2, year != 2019)


```

```{r Polity V}

polity <- read_csv("Raw_Data_Liz/p5v2018.csv", col_types = cols(
  .default = col_double(),
  scode = col_character(),
  country = col_character()
))

draft_data2$year <- as.numeric(draft_data2$year)

polity <- polity %>% 
          select("country",
                "year",
                "fragment", 
                 "sf",
                 "change",
                 "regtrans",
                 "xrreg",
                 "xrcomp",
                 "xropen",
                 "parreg",
                 "parcomp") %>% 
          filter(year >= 1960)

polity <- as.data.frame(polity)


Data_Set6 <- merge(x = draft_data2, y = polity, by = c("country", "year"), all = TRUE)

# Data_Set6 <- left_join(draft_data2, polity, by = c("country" , "year")) 

```
